import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useWallet } from '../hooks/useWallet'; export const TokenCreationPage: React.FC = () => { const { isConnected } = useWallet(); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', symbol: '', description: '', totalSupply: '1000000', launchThresholdXlm: '10', launchThresholdPercent: '80', curveType: 'linear', basePrice: '0.0001', priceMultiplier: '0.0009', }); const [isCreating, setIsCreating] = useState(false); const handleInputChange = (e: React.ChangeEvent) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, [name]: value })); }; const handleSubmit = async (e: React.FormEvent) => { e.preventDefault(); if (!isConnected) { alert('Please connect your wallet first'); return; } setIsCreating(true); try { // TODO: Implement token creation logic console.log('Creating token with data:', formData); // Simulate API call await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 2000)); alert('Token created successfully! (This is a demo)'); } catch (error) { console.error('Error creating token:', error); alert('Failed to create token'); } finally { setIsCreating(false); } }; return (

Create New Token

{!isConnected && (

Please connect your wallet to create a token.

)}
{/* Basic Information */}
